name: Happy Land (Bountable)
description:
Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 (It is not Real)

you have been given a syringe that allows you to swap between realities.

Use your syringe to swap between realities, the Happy Land  allows you to regain health and be invulnerable to attacks, kill enemies to refill your syringe, survive as long as you can!

===========================Controls==============================X = swap reality

SPACE BAR= jump

WASD = move

MOUSE = look around

===============================================================
